summary: Barty are you still in love with Reg on some level? Cause it isn't unheard of to be in love with 2 people. Coz we know you love...
question: Barty are you still in love with Reg on some level? Cause it isn't unheard of to be in love with 2 people. Coz we know you love Antonin. Sooo...?
answer: Barty: I’ll always be in love with Reg, which is stupid but I can’t do anything about it.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.description: A bunch of texts, facebook posts and whatsapp messages keep getting screenshotted and put online for the world to see.

summary: Barty, can't you use some sort of protection spell against your father?
question: Barty, can't you use some sort of protection spell against your father?
answer: Barty: Do you think I’m good at spells?  The answer is no.  I’m bad at spells.  But even if I managed to do one, my dad’s good at spells so he’d just find a way around it.

reblog.comment: Barty: Do you think I’m good at spells?  The answer is no.  I’m bad at spells.  But even if I managed to do one, my dad’s good at spells so he’d just find a way around it.

summary: La gran metedura de pata de Jude Law en 'Animales Fantásticos: Los crímenes de Grindelwald'
title: La gran metedura de pata de Jude Law en 'Animales Fantásticos: Los crímenes de Grindelwald'
body:
Todo este tiempo hemos estado bajo la impresión de que el nombre de Germott Grindelwald, interpretado por Johnny Depp, se pronunciaba fonéticamente.

Eso fue hasta que Jude Law, que interpreta a Albus Dumbledore, aparece en la última escena del tráiler final y llama a su viejo compañero “Grindelvald”. 

O sea, ¿es así como se pronuncia? En realidad, no.

El actor ha explicado por qué pronuncia el nombre del mago de esa manera y resulta que es una elección totalmente suya. ¡Y accidental! “Me lancé directamente a llamarlo Grindlevald, asumiendo que porque tenía muy buena amistad con él, lo hice bien”, explicó en The Late Show With Stephen Colbert esta semana.

“Pero, a mitad de la película, Eddie Redmayne (Newt Scamander) señaló que él no lo llamaba así, sino Grindelwald. Pero ya era demasiado tarde”, explicó dando a entender que pasó la mitad del rodaje pronunciando mal el apellido del villano protagonista y, cuando quiso remediarlo, ya habían rodado media película.

“Quiero creer que es porque Albus lo conoce bien y, en algún momento, Gellert le dijo: ´¿Puedes llamarme Grindelvald?´. Me quedo con eso”, agregó en broma para remediar su metedura de pata durante el rodaje.

Animales Fantásticos: Los crímenes de Grindelwald llegará a los cines el 16 de noviembre.

Para seguir leyendo:
Los 22 estrenos que debes tener en cuenta para lo que queda de 2018
A Daniel Radcliffe ya no lo reconocen como Harry Potter
RUMOR MÁGICO: ´Animales Fantásticos 3´ podría trasladar la historia a un país de Latinoamérica
Las PRIMERAS REACCIONES de ´Animales Fantásticos 2´ nos prometen un “final quen os dejará sin palabras”

Imágenes: ©Warner Bros.

blog.title: the boopersnatch
blog.description:
empress of the easily avoidable kitchen burns & the papercut messiah

catchphrase: at least it wasn't my vulva

summary: She is deservedly getting a lot of crap lately, but totally squeeed when I saw she liked this, the best joke ever.

summary: Book Review: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
body:
Book Review: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

This book with always house a huge peice of my heart.

You can definitely tell they’ve all grown up.

(GINNY IS DATING… SHES STILL LIKE 9 TO ME! 😭)

J.K. Killed off another one of my faves.

Ouch btw. Ouch.

I actually really really really liked snape… 😭

I was really sad to see it turn out that way but also relieved, I’d hate to see what would have become of Draco if he actually did follow through.

I’ve put a lot of sad faces… but it’s actually a really good book.

FINALLY ROMIONIE AND HINNY. THAAAAANKKK YOUUUUU.

Also am I the only one…? I can’t get enough of Neville, he is just remarkable.
